title: APSC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Adviser Posts
description: The Assam Public Service Commission (APSC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Adviser Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Civil, Electrical, and Mechanical Engineering can apply for the APSC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. The application dates have already started. Here we have...
